existing_features.title: Update the Community Feed post UI to display the author's username (from the profile) instead of the truncated principal string currently shown in each post header.
Add a dedicated React Query hook for resolving a public username by principal, and use it in PostCard when rendering the Community Feed author line.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display the username on the community feed

Add a backend query method that lets any authenticated user resolve a post author principal to a public display name (username), so the frontend can show usernames on the Community Feed without requiring admin permissions.

projectName: Show post author username on the Community Feed
